title: Crypto Custodian Hex Trust Expands European Foray With Registration in France
description: The registration, which follows last year's approval in Italy, is "a significant milestone" for its European expansion plans, Hex Trust said.

title: Total value locked across DeFi protocols down more than $3B since Curve Finance attack
description:
In the last three days, the DeFi sector has seen an 8% decline in the total value of locked assets (TVL), falling to $40.31 billion, as per DeFiLlama data. As of July 30, DeFi projects TVL stood at $43.81 billion but witnessed a sharp decline after malicious players attacked several Curve (CRV) pools on July […]

The post Total value locked across DeFi protocols down more than $3B since Curve Finance attack appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Binance’s largest market in China despite crypto ban, monthly volume hit $90B
description: Binance users engaged in cryptocurrency-related asset trading amounting to $90 billion in May 2023 within China despite cryptocurrency trading being deemed illegal in the country since 2021, a report by the Wall Street Journal reveals. Remarkably, these transactions established China as Binance’s largest market, contributing 20 percent of the total global trading volume, excluding trades ... Read more

title: Sam Bankman-Fried Asserts First Amendment Defense Amidst Prosecution
description: Disgraced FTX founder, Sam Bankman-Fried, is currently embroiled in a legal battle, invoking the First Amendment as his defense. title: MicroStrategy Releases Q2 Report; Plans to Buy More Bitcoins
description:
MicroStrategy, Michael Saylor’s business intelligence firm, revealed its plans to raise about $750 million by selling stocks to add more Bitcoins to the current portfolio which holds a total of 152,800 BTC, worth $4.53 billion. Additionally, in the second quarterly earnings report, the platform noted the company’s net income of $22.2 million, marking a massive […]
